input.sentences: we were on the bike trail for a competition called trail trek
i flipped my friend off because i was too tired to have my picture taken .
we stopped at a checkpoint to get some water .
we laid down in the grass for a while .
output.sentences: It's time for the trek on the trail competition to begin.
I tried to take a picture of my friend in the race.
Here we are getting water as we are stopped at the checkpoint.
After the competition we caught our breath while we laid in the grass.
In the parking lot the van displayed our blues logo.
